text:
Rakuten | Mobile Software Engineer | Tokyo, Japan | Full-time | VISA | ONSITE

An opportunity to work on hybrid and native mobile SDK and developer tools in Tokyo with a friendly multinational team.

Rakuten's business language is English and no Japanese language skills are required in our team.

Rakuten Group https://global.rakuten.com/corp/about/ empowers individuals and businesses around the world through innovation in digital and fintech services. Rakuten sponsors Barcelona FC, Golden State Warriors and Spartan Race.

Tech stack: Android, iOS, Kotlin, Swift, Java, Objective-C, Cordova, Javascript, React Native

Full details and to apply: https://rakuten.referrals.selectminds.com/jobs/software-deve...

Thanks
